sentences: Kas sa mäledad? Ma ei mälda midagi sellest kohtumisest.
Pärast pikka aega ma taas mäldasin lapsepõlvesõpru.
context: The word 'mäletan' is the Estonian first-person singular present tense form of the verb meaning 'I remember'. It comes from the verb root 'mäleta-' which relates to memory and recollection. In different forms, it can mean 'you remember', 'he/she remembers', etc. The dictionary definition shows that this word appears in contexts where someone is recognizing or recalling something they had forgotten.
